DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS Version 1.0 Adult Physical Health Fatigue FATIMP49 Past 7 Days Degree Fatigue Interfered with Physical Functioning Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation of the degree to which fatigue interfered with their physical functioning in the past 7 days, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain Fatigue Subordinate Domain Past Week Degree Fatigue Interfered with Physical Functioning Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health._The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess fatigue that is likely to decrease an individual's ability to carry out daily activities, including the ability to work effectively and to function at their usual level in family or social roles._The most recent week, including today._A question about to what degree an individual's fatigue interferes or interfered with their physical functioning._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain Fatigue Subordinate Domain
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.:The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess fatigue that is likely to decrease an individual's ability to carry out daily activities, including the ability to work effectively and to function at their usual level in family or social roles.

Concepts.definition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.

The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess fatigue that is likely to decrease an individual's ability to carry out daily activities, including the ability to work effectively and to function at their usual level in family or social roles.

Property.preferredName: Past Week Degree Fatigue Interfered with Physical Functioning Score
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.:A question about to what degree an individual's fatigue interferes or interfered with their physical functioning.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.

Concepts.longName: Degree Fatigue Interfered with Physical Functioning
Concepts.definition: A question about to what degree an individual's fatigue interferes or interfered with their physical functioning.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used with the PROMIS items that describes a range of subjective scores for representing how much of something an individual experiences from 1: Not at all, to 5: Very much.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of strong agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a great amount or extent.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for ECOG-ACRIN study in Rave. mc 5/4/15

ClassificationSchemes.longName: PROMIS Item Banks (Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System)

ReferenceDocuments.name: Scoring Manual Link
ReferenceDocuments.description: Link to PROMIS Assessment Center manual for scoring and additional information

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. The URL citation is provided so that caDSR users can obtain materials related to instructions for administering and/or scoring the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.
